professional_summary: Scrum Master with expertise in Agile Software Development and Oracle Database Administration. Skilled in Scrum Facilitation, Oracle 10g/11gR2, RMAN, Performance Tuning, and High Availability Solutions.

key_responsibilities: Organize and facilitate Scrum ceremonies and backlog refinement
Champion Agile software development best practices as a coach to Scrum teams
Support the Product Owner in grooming and maintaining the product backlog
Ensured the team's focus on delivering working products continuously
and maintained Oracle 10g and 11gR2 on Linux
Administered Oracle databases and ensured high availability solutions
Performed database performance tuning using RMAN
